name: Champagne Chateau Hotel
description:
DESCRIPTION
Located in the historic area of Champagne and just 1 hour from Paris and 45 minutes from Reims, this 19th century Empire-style castle is located on the banks of the Marne, in a quiet little hamlet.
Angéline and her team are eager to introduce you to their visions of the French art of living and help organise an unforgettable wedding day.
For your cocktail party or reception enjoy the bar and terrace which welcomes you and offers you a countryside view of the flowery park and the wooded banks of the Marne.
Meanwhile, the restaurant can cater for up to 60 guests inside and offers traditional French cuisine with menus inspired by the land and the seasons. French windows open onto the terrace, the park and the banks of the Marne. The perfect location for your wedding breakfast or a dinner before or after the big day.
The beautiful park offers an exceptional backdrop for your wedding ceremony or an al-fresco dining experience, with views leading down to the Marne river. Larger wedding parties can be accommodated by hiring a marquee in the grounds.
All the bedrooms offer a relaxing view of the extensive park, the Marne and the vineyards. The Chateau offers a double room on the ground floor accessible to people with reduced mobility, two double rooms and two family suites located on the 1st floor. The Chateau can accommodate 14 guests.
Pricing:
Privatization of the castle for your wedding day:
3:00 pm to 12:00 pm the following day
Includes: Gardens, 3 Dining areas, 5 Rooms, Outdoor Swimming Pool.
One-day privatization: From 3 150,00€
A two hour “Champagne” Cocktail with Canapés from € 20 per person - 9 appetizers and Champagne
Wedding breakfast menus start from € 60 per person.
A continental breakfast is available from € 14 the following day and brunch for your guests is available from € 35
In addition, for a moment of relaxation there is a heated swimming pool and sauna overlooking the park - or why not enjoy a long walk along the river.
If you require some more information on this venue then please do get in touch and we will be more than happy to help.
